content.detailedDescription:
September 2004, driving back to calgary from las vegas.
we just got married in vegas 20 september, (thats how im sure it was that date).
we set off from vegas early in the morning so that we could get back to calgary in one day,
heading for coutts border crossing, we where around great falls montana on a long dark straight road when i observed a light behind me at distance.
thinking it may be a motorbike or a truck with one light out, i wasnt too concerned.
getting closer to me i thought he's going fast. i wasnt going slow.
then he's gone, when a vehicle turns you can still see the light or the glow from the light but, there was nothing.
i dont know how long but it was back, at distance, same as before gets closer then gone.
ive been watching this in my rear view mirror, so my wife is unaware of what ive seen.
i get her to turn around in her seat and watch.
light came back, got closer, disapeared again.
she thought it was weird too.
light came back and she said "pull over, and we will see what it is".
"not a chance!" i said. then maybe after 5 apearances in total, it never came back.
that was my experience , and by the way there were no road intersections for him to turn off. scared the life out of me, i didnt know if it was aliens or rednecks.
content.summary: Light followed car then gone, then back 4 or 5 times

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard in the hot tub i was having trouble sleeping so i went out side to watch what i thought was going to be a meteor shower. only i did not see a single meteor but i did see the satellites that pass over every night. i was laying my head back looking up when it came into view i will tell we have mountains that block the view around our city so i only saw it when it passed into the visible sky. i thought it was a satellite but all the satellites are barely visible this thing was solid looking it must have been lower than the satellites how much i don't know i saw it turn east it came from the north it was short time i saw it maybe at most thirty seconds at lest ten seconds it was passing over i think it was heading some ware. at first i thought it was just a satellite so i contacted nasa and asked it they had a satellite that was acting strangely but they did not responded. i last saw it heading east the mountains block me from seeing ware it went.
content.summary: It was passing over quickly a gray round obgect

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my parents' house. i was in the garden. it was 7 pm. at this moment i decided to take a movie of the sky with my iphone in slow motion mode.  i took a section of the sky randomly.  i've recorded for more or less 10 sec. i didn't notice anything at this point. sky was a bit cloudy.

when i took a look at the video, i saw the ufo. at normal speed (24 fps), it is very hard to see it. in short, at normal speed, the ufo is invisible. when the iphone started the slow motion (240 fps), i noticed the object clearly. it is a grey/black dot. it seems to fly at the level of clouds. this ufo motion is quite strange and it moves very fast: 10 times quicker in the reality than the video. 

first i thought: "it's a kind of fly front of the aperture." when a friend of mine told me that the dot color is changing from grey to black and vice versa. meaning that the object is flying at the clouds level. clouds are affecting the object coloration seen from the land.
then i checked several times the iphone to see if there is a bug or malfunction that affects the camera. but my iphone seems ok.

now i would like to know more about this dot. i am a very open minded person and ready to hear a rational or paranormal explanation. if someone can analyze the coloration of my movie to determine the distance between the camera and the object, that could help a lot.

recommendations:
please open the video file in full screen mode. 
when the slow motion starts, the dot appears basically in the middle of the screen.
it makes few loops and goes out of the frame from the left and low side.
content.summary: The ufo appeared on my video taken with my iphone in slow motion mode.

content.detailedDescription: I was about 13 or 14 years of age when i witnessed this, i walked outdoors,to look at the sky it was evening between 9 and 11 pm.  i noticed a group of bright stationary lights in the sky.  in no particular pattern.  suddenly they started moving very rapidly, like streaks across the space between them, up down, sideways, stopping and starting so fast you could hardly see them go.  when i first noticed them i guess i thought they were stars but quickly realized they weren't, at that time i am sure they were ufo's and still do.  i could draw an example easier than i can describe they movement, as it was several objects, over 10 i believe, and very high.  after several years of thought i think they were actually having a battle.  that the spaces between them was distant perhaps.  i was excited to see them and fetched my father to look, when we came back they were gone, but he said to me that he had seen similar things himself over the years.  i was mesmerized by what i saw, i feel it was a sign to me to know such things exist.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Objects moved in a straight line and sideways as well, fast and come to an abrupt stop, i watched them several minutes and went  to get my father when i came back they were all gone,they were at a very high altitude. could have been shooting each other

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: on june 24, 2015 , 0444 hrs, i was on my porch, at my residence,new bedford , ma. in the past isit on my porch and take pictures of the sun rise in the wee hrs in the morning. on this morning, i was just playing with my cam setting it up for a couple of morning pictures ..When something caught my eye on the left side of the frame ..Cam is pointed..Southeasterly towards the cape(cape cod). being a new cam just really learning how to use it , i am not a professional ‎this info is raw and has not been altered in any way shape and form....15/‎07/‎12
content.summary: Sunrise video on wed 0444 hrs .Missle like projectile with thrust and lift..

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv--my cousin who is staying with me is a smoker and was in my back yard having a smoke when he saw the lights and came inside and got me.At first i thought they were airplanes or helicopters , but they were absolutely silent. we have trees all around us so our field of vision was limited. my cousin said i didnt see them all because some of them had passed while he came inside to get me. they were moving slowly from west to east in the northern sky. their speed was constant and 7 of them were in a v formation. the others were trailing the formation and moving at different flight levels. as far as my feelings are concerned, i felt as if i had just witnessed something very strange. we lost sight of the objects when they flew out of sight because of the trees around us.
content.summary: I saw approkimately 20 red orange starlike lights move across the sky from north to east silently. seven were in a v formation ,the others were trailing them at different flight level  . this was witnessed by my cousin who was standing right beside me.

content.detailedDescription: Friday july 10th 11:10 p.M. north of ogallala ne., i was visiting family on the north east shore of lake mcconaughy, and watching an intense thunderstorm several miles to the south. skies were clear over the lake, and with no moon light, stars and milky way were very bright. looking in a ssw direction over the lake, i observed a red blinking light moveing to the ne towards me, maybe a little over a mile in distance. elevation looked to be what a small plane would fly to look at the lake. speed was fairly slow as it took 3+ min. to reach the area of beach i was on, so i assumed it was a small plane, out for a night trip to see what things looked like in the dark out there. my observation was single red light blinking as it aproached, and no other lights. as the object was slightly less than ninty degrees above and just slightly to the west of my location, i observed a dim white light out aways to the front of the red light. it was hard to estimate distance between red center light and dim white light out on the front of the craft, but not real close. i first thought maybe plane escorting or chaseing after small orb, as those were only lights seen. object passed overhead at my guess less than 1500 feet in altitude, and i could not see any features of the craft, other than lights. i thought there was a slight rumble, but a small power generator running nearby covered sound. i quickly looked around in the dark for a witness, seeing an unknown man sitting in a nearby chair, pointed the object out to him. he said c-130 which i quickly discounted, and ran to the north to get away from large cottonwoon trees that obscured object as it flew to the north. to the north i quickly found the object, which started to make a slow turn to the west. this is when two other small dim lights appeared, makeing a very perfect triangle of dim small white lights, with the red light centered. with craft then maybe 1/2 mile away, triangle size was large, but not giant. object made a slow turn to west and then moved to a ssw path back over the lake. i decieded to leave the area to see if i could some how get close again, but lost sight of light.
content.summary: Observed triangle craft move over lake mcconaughy

content.detailedDescription: One light was blown up 200 times and lit for exposure
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights gathering formed patterns

content.detailedDescription: While spotlighting for animals around 1964 we saw a ufo land around gurneville ohio,i was driving my 1953 studebaker ,this car never broke down on me ,it shut off while driving down the road. we looked up and  saw the ufo land at the edge of the woods 2 0r 3 small aliens came out of the craft,after a confrontation the got back in and left we chose not to report it because,gene and i were going into the army on the buddy system  back then you would suffer a lot of abuse even by your friends ,it made the papers.The next day , gene my buddy said, did you hear about all the people over there checking that landing out. i said no, so we drove over and the sheriff and military cars had completely surrounded the area .There was a burnt circle in the field a local farmer had reported it ,i remember it being in the paper.
content.summary: My friend and i witnessed this ufo landing while we were hunting around 1964 65

content.detailedDescription: I woke up at about 4am pdt to a very loud sounding aircraft. i thought it was possibly military helicopters. i got up to take a look and it was a giant flat looking rectangle object in the air with many lights. white and green mostly but i saw red later on. this was quite a long siting (1.5 hours). the sfpd definitely watched this object as well, as they were all over the streets and our bay bridge. they even had a black suv that they escorted onto the bridge during the siting. the suv had a bunch of electronics equipment on it. one of the most interesting things about this siting is that the ufo (or drone?) used a white search light quite brazenly over the city and especially -- aimed at the sf bay bridge. (i live in a high rise condo w a view of the bay bridge and could see this aircraft from multiple angles). the craft hovered near/above the bay bridge and dragged the search light back and forth from span to span. the cops were totally watching this.  another interesting thing about the craft is that it was incredibly loud. aside from myself and the police officers, there really should be a lot of people reporting this siting. i took photos and video with my iphone which are pretty lame unfortunately. i also tried capturing the sound of the craft with the voice memo app on my phone. none of these multimedia files are very good quality.  (about the weather conditions, it was a clear night with just a few clouds but after the thing departed off to the east, an extremely dark cloud/fog bank started to take shape over there. i took a pic of that too b/c it seemed odd.)
content.summary: Rectangle ufo with many blinking lights and a "spot/search light"

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my front yard and looked up and seen a sphere fly over my house at a high altitude and rate of speed. it went out of sight so i went to my back deck and saw it hovering stationary, i watched it stay stationary for a little over a half hour, then it disappeared. it didn't fly away, just simply vanished. i have pictures of the event.
content.summary: Seen an orb typed sphere fly over my house then hover, then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I'm on ufo # 22 over my house. i was in my front yard like i am everyday around 4-430pm. and just like clockwork a ufo shows up. i was shocked the very first time i saw one but i'm use to it now. i just snap pictures. this ufo came down tree level! i was shocked. it seem to be observing me or something else. it hovered for a few moments then took off in a fast speed but not to fast. it did a swing around and this is when i saw the lights on front. i'm still shocked by how low it came.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A funny dark shaped ufo with light on front! i have picture

content.detailedDescription: I have been seeing these for a while now. i will do 2 reports because i have too many videos and every time i try to upload them it times out... this is part 2.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on interstate 90 nearing north bend when i noticed a strobe like white light coming g from over the mountains. the strobe flashed about every two seconds. the light would get lighter and darker like it was shifting east and west over the top of the interstate.  my girlfriend was sleeping in the car next to me and after about two minutes i woke her up to make sure i wasn't going crazy. we had previously been attending a concert so i thought my eyes might be light sensitive. she woke up and saw the lights, about a minute later we rounded a corner that brought us around the side of a mountain and the light became much more visible. the stobing light seemed to go mostly up into the sky and was incredible bright. the source seemed to be behind trees on the left side of the freeway. then suddenly for one strobe the source of the light came compleately into view. it was a perfect sphere and shone a brilliant white light. it was so bright that it appeared to have black lines on it but could have just been my eyes not able to handle the brightness. it felt similar on the eyes to staring into the sun. after about a two second strobe it disappeared and when it next appeared was partially behind some trees back off to my left. it continued to travel the same direction until going out of view behind me. i saw the flash/ strobe re appear in my rear view mirror momentarily about thirty seconds later. this craft was moving extremely speraticly east and west over the interstate and then changed coarse to the left of the interstate after coming into my view. the sphere seemed to disappear between stobes and then re appear at a slighly different altitude or on a different coarse next time it appeared. me and my girlfriend were both shocked and agreed it was a ufo and most likely technology we would never see again in our lifetime. also it began to rain as we were close to the craft. stopped as soon as it went out of view. only rain i've seen all summer in washington
content.summary: Bright white sphere strobing white light anti gravity direction change and hoverig

content.detailedDescription: This happened awhile back, acouple years ago.It has effected my life and everything i believed in . it taught me to believe in myself even when nobody else would.I went  fishing one night at this pond in front of this nursing home on a country road where there was a no fishing sign so i was risking getting introuble but still did. so im fishing there and i look up in the sky and there they were . i wasn't scared i was more amazed. they were very close but not close enough where i could get a clear description on what they exactly looked like they were big tho. it was dark but i could still see there shadowy figures almost like they were blending in but not completely  . the lights looked like they were in a triangle formation and moved weird. for some reason i feel like someone else was with me but that part is kind of a blur . i just remember telling the person that was with me look at that, holyyy crap , i got excited. when i first seen the ufos they were just hovering without any noise for acouple of minuts maybe only 1 they were watching me i could sense it. then its like they knew i was looking right at them .They instantly zig zagged back and forth left to right faster then anything i have ever seen with no noise and eventually disappeared . at that point i knew it wasnt man made it seemed impossible. i now believe in the impossible. after that ive only told acouple close people but its like they dont really believe me and or they do but dont really care like i do . maybe its because they never seen what i saw . i care alot about what i seen and want to do something about it but i dont know what i can do . i feel like i didnt see them on purpose its like they chose me . i have a picture i took acouple days ago you guys might want to check out. i showed one person but that person doesnt seem to care that much or think its anything but i know it is for a fact . i took a picture of myself and beside me you can see a weird figure that looks like a invisible alien just half of its face and its eye slanted  almost like a ghost and it kinda looks mad but i dont know . i dont know why i feel like ive been chosen or what for but i feel like they have been with me this whole time as crazy as it sounds . its hard to explain but im a very honest and straight forward person and i know what im talking about.I know the pictures i took mean something i just dont know what . i hope you guys look into this. this is random but if i could choose one job in this world as a dream job it would be in this feild because im fascinated by what ive seen and it never leaves my myned. i would rather show pics directly of my phone so you dont think its been messed with or any of that i have 2 pics 1 good one, the one. now im going to look threw and see if i missed anything in any other pics .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: They knew i seen them and zigged zagged off faster then anything ive ever seen.

content.detailedDescription: I was driveing my tractor traleron back road my head lights shine on it and look like 3 or 4 big men this is in a field next to fence  man size people were standing next to this big craft./ i have had 2 other sighings/ one at age 6 or 8 yo. /one at age of 13 and i was about 23. thank you for checking this out.      tommy ault              ps if you want to know about the 3 other sightings just let me know ok.
content.summary: Look like size of helicoper

content.detailedDescription: Strangely enough, i was watching the siruis documentary on net flicks and out of the corner of my eye i saw a bright orb through my house window. i studied it silently and notice that the light got brighter!Feeling a little insecure about what i was seeing, i told my fiancé, "there's a bright light in the sky right over there." he got up and looked out the window and say the same orb that i did! from my view at this point there was two orbs; each dimming and illuminating at their own independent pace. our window faces the sw deseret past albuquerque called "pajarito" desert. my fiancé quickly went out side to get a better view. i followed him some what nervous of the sighting. i have grown up seeing orbs all my life, especially the orange and red ones. the last two new years have brought these red orbs straight to my door basically. anyway, we go outside and we are still able to see one bright white orb that was extremely bright. i quickly called my father who lives next door and had been wanting to see these orbs for himself. as i was on the phone with him, i was able to get a photo of the orb. it disappeared shortly after i took a photo.
content.summary: Bright white orb sw of albuquerque

content.detailedDescription:
These orbs were reported on local news station 4th of july weekend because 
people reported seeing them. no explaination as to what they are was given! anyone know? they do fly in an airspace that planes use. no planes at time of sightings though.Very strange and unnerving. i would like to know what they are.They just seem to disappear at a certain point. we have previous video and cell phone pics. not sure you can see from these pics , they are above streetlights'.
content.summary: 2 orange orbs followed by one white one. this is the third time we see this. first sighted on july 3 rd2015 again on the 4th of july and  now tonight.Same travel path each time. first thought was chinese lanterns. but how the same travel path?Travels over

content.detailedDescription: I was trying to catch some lighting on my cell phone video to show my wife, she has ms and cant move so i was going to show her the strom on video and caught something shoot by super fast and boom it was gone
content.summary: Super fast bright yellow light swooched by heading torwards a storm

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were camping in a large campground and sitting by the fire around 2210 hours. my teenage son pointed to the east and asked, "what is that?"  my wife, daughter, and i turned to observe an orange, pulsating, fiery orb hovering over and beyond a local lighthouse. the orb then moved upwards, hovered, then moved right then left. the orb began to move downwards toward the ocean at a slow steady pace. we observed the orb go behind a low cloud and could observe the cloud illuminated from behind. the object then picked up speed as it was changed direction to the right and we lost sight of the illumination in the cloud.  we went to visit a friend who was also at the campground. at approxately 2250 hours our friend pointed to the sky, in the same direction as before and stated "what's that?"  my whole family and i looked up to see the same orb in the same place!  at that time we told our friend what we had observed earlier. this time the orb hovered in one place. i used my iphone and took a short video. not long after i turned off the video, the orb vanished. within a matter of minutes, we observed a fastoving aircraft in the area. i must admit, we watch hanger1 on a regular basis and are somewhat on the fence concerning alien life. my wife has lived in the area her whole life and i've been here 20 years. we have been camping at this campground several times a year for about 8 years and have never seen anything like this before. we have observed several rocket launches from a nearby nasa facilility and this was definitely different.  my son sent the video to two of his friends who also observed the same orb, however they were about thirty miles away.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: First sighting orange orb moving up/down right/left and hovering. light could be seen through cloud as it accelerated down and right. 2nd time hovered then disappeared instantly.

content.detailedDescription:
This happened on july 11th, at approximately 10 pm over lake tohopekaliga. i was driving down pleasant hill road as i usually do at least 3 nights out of the week with my brother in the passenger seat. the sky was absolutely clear, there wasn't a cloud in sight. as the road adjusted to face n-ne, the strange orange-red lights in the sky situated prominently in half an arc configuration caught my eye. off slightly to the left of this arc was what looked like a relatively normal aircraft, possibly a helicopter flying right by the lights. instantly i thought that there might be some kind of military aircraft exercise going on, but quickly changed my mind when i realized the lights weren't moving, they seemed to stay exceptionally stationary and there were no blinking lights like that which you usually view from normal aircraft, these lights were solid and not moving.

my brother thought they might be flares, but i've never seen flares to get up that high and hover for over a minute in a single position. nor should there ever be a reason to have 6 flares up at once in that strange formation. he also put that notion to bed. given that july 4th wasn't too long ago, that was also a thought that crossed our minds, but no one has fired a firework for days now and again, the behavior was not like a firework... it hovered for a long time and didn't explode.

the formation of lights were pretty uneventful as we witnessed them for well over a minute before the lights got behind us and to the right and disappeared behind some tall trees when we pulled into a street to turn around and get some video which unfortunately we simply couldn't get. it took us 30 seconds to get back, but the lights were all gone except for the aircraft which was still in the area.

initially,  as soon as we saw the lights we were asking each other what it was, then decided to get the camera (phone), but it was too late, plus we didn't think we could record it at night. i'm still shocked at the notion of having witnessed a ufo and coming online only to be met with images and video of exactly what i had seen tonight! not to mention, there was someone else who reported a sighting on mufon of the same thing that i've described here almost exactly a month ago, at almost exactly the same spot and the same time and the same characteristics! fascinating!
content.summary: Six orange-red stationary orbs in half an arc formation above lake toho.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were driving in car through wooded, mountainous area, 10pm, noticed bright, orange light to our left (east) heading our direction.  i pulled the car over quickly to park, while object continued in our direction, and flew directly over our car traveling west. there was no sound, bright orange jellyfish shaped, with very bright orange glow, as object was directly overhead we could see a horizontal long flame underneath.  still no sound, no other lights, just huge orange globe. object continued west with slight deviation to north, then back west and appeared to pick up speed. we tried to turn around and follow to observe, but object traveling too quickly.  total time of visual about 3-5 minutes...Traveling at speed approximately same as small plane landing, elevation around small plane, no structures or lines seen on object except the flame directly underneath object.  object was penny to quarter size if held up to sky for comparison. my son and i were very excited, curious, and compared our sighting afterward to verify.  this is the third sighting that we have had within two years, and as this happened we had just been talking about how we were in a great area to see a ufo, and how it had been about a year since we had last seen one.  at first we thought it was like a floating lantern, but as it came closer, and then directly over us, it was very apparent it was not anything of the sort, or anything that we can compare it to, except what we saw.
content.summary: Headed home from wooded area in mountainous area, very bright large glowing orb shaped object appeared in sky coming from east, pulled car over immediately, object then proceeded to travel over car and continue to head west.

content.detailedDescription:
1. outside on break in marcy ny at aprox 12:25am
2. i always keep an eye to the sky on break because i have a such a wide open view, the object was slowing moving across the sky
3. at first i thought it was a star until it changed color and startd blinking from light yellow "like a star would look" to a dark red and you could see a hazey ball looking object, it start to move across the sky at the same elevation and then got lower and started to change color, it got really bright, and then really dull and suddenly disappeared.
5. i was excited i seen something out of the ordinary 
6. the object simply vanished
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: At first i thought it was a star...But then i noticed it turned bright red..And then yellowish and then change elevation, then it stoped and got smaller and smaller till it vanished..No sound at all

content.detailedDescription: July 4th 2015, birmingham, al about 8:45 pm central time several spectators were gathered for the nights firework show " thunder on the mountain"  near vulcan park that was scheduled to start at 9 pm, several people shouted to look to the west of our direction and i turned to see something that appeared to be disk shaped with flashing white, red, and green lights ascended as if taking off. once the object reached about 20 degrees on the western horizon it stalled and hovered for about one second, the object then moved east, turned south , then back north and at this point jetted away into the distance. the movement was not like any aircraft i have ever witnessed as a civilian or at any point during my time in the military. the entire city of birmingham had their eyes to the sky that evening and i am sure there are way more witnesses that seen this object, but i can not assure anyone knew what they were seeing or if they even was paying attention as it was not quite time for the fireworks to begin yet. i know for a fact at least 10- 20 people saw this that was in my area, as i was not the first to spot this object i tried to get to my camera in time but it was gone by then.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object ascended, hovered for a second, flew east, changed direction of flight path several times and hovered a few times before jetting off into distance

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from work for a few hours because my department was over staffed and i'm usually there all night.It was a perfect night for star gazing i noticed a unusually bright star to the west about ten o'clock high to the east was another star and to the east of that was the moon two day's from full all along the same plane.I looked at the star for a few seconds maybe a minute and it appeared to jump i refocused my eyes and continued to watch it began to move erratically left to right, up and down, dropping and then raising. it then would zig zig, peak the valley, zig zag back and peak the valley. it then made a box pattern. then to the east a smaller less bright light approached the bigger light, i thought it was a plane, i expected it to pass through and come out the other side but it didn't the bigger light absorbed the smaller light. i then turned away and refocused my eyes and looked back, the star was still jumping around. i got scared and went inside. i then went back outside to return to work 45 mins later. the moon and it's accompanying star had moved and wet still visible, but the light that was at 10 o'clock was nowhere to be seen, above or below its former position.This actually was the third sighting of the moving star. i refused to believe it the first two times. i'm just wondering if anyone else has noticed strange lights.
content.summary: A light like a star was moving abruptly left to right up and down made a box shape then absorbed a smaller light moving towards it from the east

content.detailedDescription:
Stepped outside during a phone call and immediately spotted a strange light moving in an unusual direction for area aircraft. steady orange glow, moving horizontaly in the northern sky right to left. within about 20 seconds a group of three more, and another group of five came into view all traveling the same speed, altitude and path. they all made a gentle turn toward the north and each dimmed as it made the turn, as if the lights were coming from their fronts. more kept appearing to the east and traveled the same path. this went on for several minutes, and i filmed the last three. the most i could see at once were 8- all spread out across the sky, and traveling the same path. they varied from about 10 degrees above the horizon to 20 degrees. some a appeared a bit closer than other. i would have thought them to be helicopters, but there were no navigation lights and i could not hear any noise whatsoever. they appeared identical.
at one point, i observed an orange/yellow line of light descend vertically from one, as if a firey object was dropped. 
during the display a jet aircraft passed overhead on its usual descent towards bergstrom international airport to my south. it appearred to be at a higher altitude than the objects.
content.summary: 12 identical glowing objects passed by, widely spaced same path.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work and was driving when i noticed above the tree line what seemed to be a really bright shooting star until it flashed like a strobe light would then the object stopped in its path flashed again then started moving again in the same path i lost it as it got further below the tree line the guy i work with saw it as well at a different vantage point than i did
content.summary: Saw fireball

content.detailedDescription: I decided to take a picture of the beautiful mountains. i didnt notice this object until i developed my pictures. i saw a black dot in the sky and as i got a closer look in graphics i noticed a ufo of some sort. it had red and green lighting around it. i am sure it is not an airplane or anything so i am very concerned if i can get an explanation
content.summary: Oval shape. red and green lighting. reflecting of the sun right above horizon line
